title: My phone cannot be discovered by other Bluetooth devices. Why?
answer:
Bluetooth is turned off. 

 Touch Settings and turn on Bluetooth. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110566)

 Your device is invisible though Bluetooth is turned on. 

 Touch Settings > Bluetooth and select your device. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110567)
